steps.name: Launch the Apollo pharmacy Application "https://www.apollopharmacy.in/?srsltid=AfmBOoqy7LoyB7STzeABdcbQ3p8hGe1D1GMrC4-ANNi4JWhVJYVgKvE0"

User clicks on Brand
